title: Ping Issues
body: Last few days my ping has doubled for seemingly no reason. Reset router/computer. Sent in ticket to rito with trace log. Apparently this isn't just an ISP issue. Living in Alberta, using Shaw.

replies.body: Ping issues like this can be caused by network issues like a poor connection or packet losses.  How your ISP reaches the game servers may have also changed, and the traceroute you mentioned should help pinpoint that.  Until a tech specialist reaches out, I recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  This will help rule out possibilities with local network issues.  Good luck!
